actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Bite

name: Shadow Mastiff [MoM]
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

specialTraits.description: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.
specialTraits.name: Ethereal Awareness

specialTraits.description: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Weakness
